Instance.description: The Sim creates an object in an inventory as part of a crafting process.

TunableEnum.name: inventory_participant
TunableEnum.description: The participant type who has the inventory for the created target to go into.

Tunable.name: use_family_inventory
Tunable.description: If checked, this object will be added to the family inventory of the tuned sim participant. If the participant is not a sim, this tunable will be ignored.
